values:
It's always an eye opener when you think you're an okay person...you go out of your way to help...and then in reality, someone tells you that your a sacastic mean bitch.  Someone sent me a great email the other day...here it is. 

NAIL IN THE FENCE
 

Make sure you read all the way down to the
last sentence.
 
(Most importantly the last sentence.)
 

There once was a little boy who had a bad temper. His Father gave him a bag of nails and told him that every time he lost his temper, he must hammer a nail into the back of the fence. The first day the boy had
driven 37 nails into the fence. Over the next few weeks, as he learned to control his anger, the number of nails hammered daily gradually dwindled down. He discovered it was easier to hold his temper than to
drive those nails into the fence.
 
Finally the day came when the boy didn't lose his temper at all. He told his father
about it and the father suggested that the boy now pull out one nail for each day that
he was able to hold his temper.
 
The days passed and the young boy was finally able to tell his father that all the nails were gone. The father took his son by the hand and led him to the fence. He said, "You have done well, my son, but look at the holes in the fence. The fence will never be the same. When you say things in anger, they leave a scar just like this one. You can put a knife in a man and draw it out.
 
It won't matter how many times you say I'm sorry, the wound is still there. " A verbal wound is as bad as a physical one.
 
Friends are very rare jewels, indeed. They make you smile and encourage you to succeed.
They lend an ear, they share words of praise and they always want to open their hearts to
us." 

It's National Friendship Week. Show your friends! how much you care. Send this to
everyone you consider a FRIEND, even if it means sending it back to the person who
sent it to you. If it comes back to you, then you'll know you have a circle of friends.
 
YOU ARE MY FRIEND AND I AM HONORED!

I read that and it stunned me.  I realized that a lot of time I get angry, I do say mean things...so I wanted to change.  I took care in saying how I felt calmly...not getting angry.  What did that get me??  It got me..."why are you so selfish, why are you trying to lay a guilt trip on me"  I was also told that if I left...the door was open.  I feel my heart was ripped out...this whole not getting angry and speaking feelings bullshit has torn me open.  I was told to get some friends...when in my eyes I feel I sacraficed all my friends to be here...why should I have to find more....

I remember other times I was left crying room...with the sounds of video games in the background.  It's a shot in the face...or in other words...a nail in the back only to leave a wound.
http://jdeez0731.livejournal.com/2872.html

Hello everyone...you are now talking to a finally FORMER employee of Claire's.  I'm calling out sick Friday and Saturday, and leaving a lovely voicemail to my DM Saturday night that she can kiss my ass.

But before I close the chapter of Claire's in my life...I have my last customer stupid question....

A lady comes to the cashwrap, puts her stuff down to buy and says...."Do you mind ringing this all up before I pay?"

Um...come again?  No mam here at Claire's I can add all this up, add tax and get your money BEFORE I ring it up.  You fucking dumb piece of shit.

Welp..2005 is here.  New apartment and a new job, it's about fuckin time!
http://jdeez0731.livejournal.com/2704.html

Okay welp...first off....Cincinnati BLOWS ASS AT SNOW REMOVAL.  Okay now that that is off my chest on to better things.  I got the offer for the job, now I just have to find time to pee in a cup next week and the job is mine.  Good fuckin riddins Claire's.  Everything seems to be falling together quite nicely.
http://jdeez0731.livejournal.com/2455.html

Well finally I have some decent news.  After months of Tack and I living in this....room, we've found a new apartment!  He goes to sign the lease tonight and we can start movin our stuff in.  I've been sayin for a while that I have two hells, work and this room....and now we'll have a new apartment, and I'm slowly workin on that other problem.  I have a job interview on Wednesday EVERYONE KEEP THEIR FINGERS CROSSED FOR ME!  I cannot take Claire's another second!

I hope everyone has a great holiday.  I'm looking forward to the time off and it being over.  I've only done a little bit of shopping with the little time I have.  I haven't even gotten my cards in the mail yet!  I have to find some time to do that crap or I'll be sending belated Christmas cards.

What's everyone doing for New Years?  Tack and I were orignally going to spend the night at a casino near here, but they were all booked up.  Then he had the idea of driving to Chicago and spending the night.  But now that we have a new apartment with actual space, we think we'll stay home and safe and invite some people over.  Should be fun...I've had some interesting New Years....lol..

Anyway I'm off...figured I'd write something in this thing.  peace
http://jdeez0731.livejournal.com/2091.html

Okay so I've proven myself yet again and I totally suck at updating this.

Merry F'n Christmas to all the folks who work retail.  47 hours later and a call from my shitty DM that I didn't work enough and I'm thrilled to call myself a Claire's employee.  Oh yes...drum roll please...the winner of Claire's stupid questions asked by customers goes to.....

Thank you mam and would you like a gift bag to go with your purchase *points behind myself to show the bag*  and you don't have to pay for them, they're free. 

Hmmmmm do I have to buy it?

NO YOU DUMB PIECE OF SHIT YOU DO NOT! BUT YOU MAY WANT TO GO PURCHASE A HEARING AID!!!!!!!!!

Anyway, I hope everyones Thanksgiving filled you to the brim.  Tack and I went for the gander and made our own!  Oh yes fellow people I cooked.  We documented the whole fiasco with pictures.  And everyone has to know...oh yes my lovely boyfriend made ME...yes ME stick my hand in that thing and pull out the neck, which mind you looked like a crooked penis!  Lovely...here is the pic as I'm telling myself over and over "not a big deal, this is not a big deal"  I then pulled it out quickly and threw it into the sink!

 

Christmas will be in Cleveland this year.  This will be my first time away from my family on Christmas.  I'm hoping we can get a long weekend in CT in the end of January.  Then finally a trip to Florida will hopefully be planned as well!  Here is a pic I would like to share that I took last Tuesday at the show, I was quite proud of myself and my babycakes for doing such a move right in my face!  Way to set up the shot baby!!
http://jdeez0731.livejournal.com/1945.html

As I knew I would be, I am absolutely terrible at updating this.  I think everyone feels that there aren't enough minutes in the day, I feel that way all the time.  My two days off fly by and I feel as if I've done nothing.  I'm at work constantly.  Finally, a week from tomorrow I return to Connecticut.  I haven't been home for a year now.  It's long past due.  I wish it could be longer then 4 days, but I'll take whatever I can get, especially around the holidays working in retail. 

As soon as I go to write in this damn thing, I realize what a totally boring life I lead.  I have absolutely nothing to put in here.  All I know is FBI is on a mission for me...and when shes completes this mission I'll be one happy lady!  FBI IS MY HERO!  If anyone only knew....

I need to do something...I feel as though I'm living each day the same and just don't going anywhere.  I'm sitting here playing video games like I did when I was in high school?  Did I graduate?  Did I go to college?  Did I then graduate college?  Has all this time gone by and I'm still sitting in front of this computer!?  At least I can say this...I don't eat McDonalds anymore, and I go to the gym...both things I thought I'd never say.  Thanks babycakes!

Well enough boring you people...I do have one last statement...

I hate phone tag....especially with people I really want to talk to.....
http://jdeez0731.livejournal.com/1551.html

It seems the second I stop watching wrestling that I lose all my friends.  It's a pretty shitty feeling.  I feel no one wants to come and visit, or spend time with just me...unless wrestling is involved.

I feel I have no one anymore.  It's a pretty lonely thought.  I can't explain it, but I've just been feeling so crappy as of late.  I need to go home for a while....
http://jdeez0731.livejournal.com/1425.html

I'm totally awesome at updating this aren't I?  hahah anyway I'm going to have to start this off with my...dum dum dum dummm...

Stupid Question Asked By Claires Customers-

This woman calls me and asks if we do piercings...okay this is normal.  I go through all the bullshit of ya its this much ya this is what we do.  So she goes on to say alright well great do you guys have accessories.  Okay now this may be a little bit silly considering I work at CLAIRE'S ACCESSORIES.  But...are you ready for this?  Okay great do you cut hair?

UM hello?  Is this a joke?  Are you kidding!  I started laughing!  I had no idea what to do.  People never shock me.

So anyway.  I have not much to talk about rather then work.  I recieved a picture of my father today, who thought it was a great idea to go shave off all his hair.  I told my mother if he buys a motorcycle and starts wearing pleather that I need to come home immediately.  And this picture...I would post here for alls amusement...but I do love my father :)

For Tack and my birthday celebrations, we've decided to go to Six Flags Fear Fest.  I'm excited about it.  A new me...liking rollercoasters and scary things.  What's this man doing to me?

I hope all is well with everyone.
http://jdeez0731.livejournal.com/1206.html

I feel I have to update considering I just started this thing.  To be honest, I really have nothing to say.  I've been really upset as of late, not eatting, not sleeping...and not smiling at all.  Thank god I have tomorrow off or I'd scream.  I do not have a winner today in the stupid question asked at Claires, frankly because from the time I opened to when I left I had 3 customers.  1 of which decided to return 127.00 worth of stuff that you know she wore to her homecoming and returned!  grrrrrrrrrrrr

Golden girls is on, I'm laying down, endulging myself in wine and hopefully these brillant women can make me laugh.

I hope all is well with everyone.  I miss the laughs...I miss the connections....I miss it all

 

Have a fucking sparkling day....
http://jdeez0731.livejournal.com/911.html

Working in retail I am asked a shitload of dumb questions.  So I've decided to have a section on here dedicated to Stupid Question of the Day at Claires.  And the winner today is....

This lady and her 8 year old came in.
 
Lady:  Hello mam my daughter recieved a 5 dollar gift card to your store from her book club!
Me:  *thinking* Wow lady your kid is a total dork, big deal 5 bucks...and oh..by the way don't call me mam***  wow thats great!
Lady:  Could you direct me to where she could by something?
Me..stunned:  um well...uh...the store has a lot to buy in it.....walked away

Um ya lady...let me direct you to the section of our store that SELLS things.  Better yet, I just made this new display over here of WOW things you can BUY for 5 bucks!

Dumb shithead....


So I feel a little better today.  I'm glad to see people actually read the totally intelligent things I had to say.  Wow to Amanda for making an appearance...girl its been ages!

Jaime I saw ur message today...Tell Becka you don't work for her anymore, you're not her pawn...and you don't think you should see eachother anymore.  It's defintely YOU...not me....   :)

Big 3 year anniversary at Red Barn for HWA on Saturday.  Should be a decent show, and I'm glad I'll have a few people to sit with this time...it gets so lonely!

Sorry Jaime...I had to...

I may update later, but for now....thats all.  Peace love and chicken greace...
http://jdeez0731.livejournal.com/649.html

Well here it is and I can't believe it myself.  J-Deez has a LJ.  Diablo2 had damn relam down and I was sitting here thinking to myself.  As some of you know, Jaime + thinking = not a good thing.  While wallowing is self caca I thought to myself to maybe make one of these things.

This will be my sorry attempt at some last hope of sarcasm and laughs in my life.  I feel I've lost touch with too many of you.  Please...come here and laugh if anything....for our pasts :)  Let's see if I still have it in me....

 

That was my first sorry attempt.  Okay SOMEONE had to laugh....please!  

So I was talking to Jeb *COOTER* today.  Theres a good possibility shes visiting Cincy in November.  I'm really excited for it, considering this would be the first time meeting here in like...5 years!  Jaime...wtf man who took your cell...I'll beat their ass!  I'm tellin ya TIffany has struck again.  I will never forget that night as long as I live.  "Jaime...jaim....SHE COULD CALL CHINA!"

I end on that note...and to steal a mans quote....Until then.
http://jdeez0731.livejournal.com/352.html
